page.title: 16AN ADULT'S DAY ON SCORAIG
page.content: "WE USUALLY WAKE ABOUT 8am AND HAVE BREAKFAST. WHILE MY HUSBAND IS FEEDING ANF MILKING THE COWS,I DO THE CLEANING AND WASHING.THEN IT'S TIME TO FEED THE HENS,CHASE THE COWS ON TO THE HILL AND POTTER ROUND THE GARDEN. "AFTER LUNCH I DASH OUTSIDE AGAIN TO WORK IN THE GARDEN OR DIG DITCHES. JOBS VARY SO MUCH ACCORDING TO THE WEATHER AND TIME OF YEAR.LIVING HERE ONE LEARNS TO BE FLEXIBLE. "LATER I START TO GET OUT SUPPER. THE VEGETABLES MOSTLY COME FROM THE GARDEN.AFTERWARDS IT'S TIME FOR HOME- WORK,READING TO THE CHILDREN AND GETTING THEM TO BED. "I TRY TO SPIN OR KNIT IN THE EVENING.BUT THE QUIET CAN SUDDENLY BE CHANGED BY FRIENDS ARRIVING TO SAMPLE THE HOME BREW. WE ARE USUALLY IN BED BY MIDNIGHT."
